transArray.content: It was unexpectedly good. I swiped my ID card on the entry machine and the formalities were completed. It looked like a new hotel at first glance. The bedding on the floor and walls of the room was clean and I liked it at first sight. The Xiaodu speaker electric curtains and the breakfast tasted good. The only slight drawback is that I couldnâ€™t find this place on the commonly used taxi-hailing apps, so I used an uncommon app to hail a taxi, and I got scammed.

Dear guests, you look up at the fireworks, but there is a brighter light in your eyes than the fireworks. The light of fireworks is only a moment. The light in your eyes is eternal. I love you, little man.
